Title: Carlos Correa sets extension deadline for Astros
Description: Carlos Correa will be a free agent after the 2021 season, and if the Houston Astros want to get his contractual situation sorted early, it’s going to have to happen soon.Correa said Monday that he does not want extension talks to serve as a distraction during the season and added that he wants to get a deal done before the start of the regular season.
Author: Larry Brown Sports on MSN.com
